title: Medior Software Engineer
Full-stack Developer (Remote - EN Fluent)
description:
Wait a minute.

Deep inside you are looking for a new adventure with…

 * 🗽 Freedom: feeling free to work remotely or hybrid and being trusted to deliver
 * 🔥 Ambition: growing up surrounded by smart colleagues driven to create something big
 * 😍 Impact: contributing to transform people lives at scale and feel your own impact in the company
   
   

And you deserve it because:

 * You have a track record in creating head-turning user-friendly websites and efficient automation tools
 * You have a passion for technology and a desire to make a meaningful impact.
 * You thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
   
   

You also happen to want to use your experience as an awesome Full-stack Developer to contribute to impacting the lives of thousands of people?

Then this job might be for you!

This is a full-time position, carried out from our beautiful offices in Dubai, Lisbon (2023), or from the comfort of your couch 🛋️. English fluency is required.

But maybe YOU WONDER WHAT’S OUR STORY ? 😉

At Paradox, we are convinced that people do not want “just a job” anymore.

We are all craving to have an impact through our professional journey. Some want to start their own venture, some want to become an intrapreneur in their current organization, some others just want their day-to-day tasks to have more meaning.

🎯 PARADOX HAS ONE GOAL: TO EMPOWER PEOPLE AND ORGANIZATIONS TO LIVE THEIR TRUE AMBITIONS.

But where do we start?

If you have an interest in personal development, you probably already know that:

 * Making things happen is a real struggle when you don’t know what truly inspires you and how to get there ;
 * Available resources are either boring 😴 or full of crazy unsubstantiated theories 🤪.
   
   

It needs to change, and we’re here to make it happen!

⭐️ OUR AMBITION IS TO MAKE SUCCESS THE ONLY POSSIBLE OUTCOME FOR OUR CLIENTS (WHATEVER SUCCESS MEANS FOR THEM), BY CRAFTING INNOVATIVE & CAPTIVATING BREAKTHROUGH EXPERIENCES.

In other words, we want to make personal growth as entertaining as watching Netflix.

How, you might be wondering?

 * We travel the world and surround ourselves with top entrepreneurs (Richard Branson - Founder of Virgin, Marc Simoncini - Founder of Meeting, Fred Mazzella - Founder of BlablaCar), world athletes (Frederick Bousquet - World record in 50m free swimming, Frank Leboeuf - WorldCup Footballer), and artists (Gad Elmaleh - Comedian, Barry Osborne - Producer of Lord of the Rings and Matrix) ✊;
 * We reverse engineer their strategies for achieving success and lean on the latest researches about neuroscience ⚙️;
 * We deliver trainings & educational contents around Power Skills (critical thinking, productivity, leadership, public speaking, coaching, stress management, etc.), self-growth and performance, through a balanced set of e-learning programs, events and edutainment videos 💡.
   
   

From one well-known Founder to a team of +80 people today (and counting!), this approach has paid off and enabled us to exceed 2 million followers on social networks, and to have thousands of people attending our online events and training courses.

And here are the vessels we embarked on to complete our mission:

 * Effective Coaching Institute
 * Business Tribe
 * David Laroche
   
   

🔥 TOGETHER, WE ARE DRIVEN BY ONE DREAM:

 * Helping 100 000 people achieve their dream and display their pictures on what we call the “100 000 dreams wall” ;
 * Giving our clients access to constant personal growth by reinventing their learning experience ;
 * Have Will Smith and Richard Branson in our next documentary.
   
   

And that’s where you come in.

YOUR MISSION 🚀

🎯 Ready to become a coding superhero? Your main mission, should you choose to accept it, is to concoct top-notch, scalable, and secure web applications for both our internal processes and ground-breaking new products.

Here's a sneak peek of your action plan:

1- EFFICIENCY MAESTRO

🔧 First things first, let's get our house in order. You'll design custom tools to streamline our daily operations.

🤖 You'll automate those pesky repetitive tasks, because who needs those, right? More time for the fun stuff!

📊 How about a custom data dashboard to track business metrics? Your work will guide our strategic decisions.

2- WEBSITE BUILDING

🌐 Our brand is you. You'll shape our corporate and brand websites, making sure they shine on the world wide web.

🔒 Digital fort? Check. You'll ensure our websites are as secure as Fort Knox.

🚀 Let's give people a fast ride. You'll optimize website speed and performance, both for desktop and mobile users.

3- FINANCIAL FLOWS OPTIMIZATION

💸 Smooth and secure financial transactions? You're on it.

🔍 Like a Sherlock of finances, you'll troubleshoot and resolve any issues with our financial systems.

🧪 Regular system tests? You're already planning the next one.

4- NEW PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT

💡 Here's your chance to be a part of the magic. You'll help ideate, code, and debug new software and applications.

🌟 Collaborate with the product dream team to make our offerings the best in the market.

5- CONTINUOUS LEARNING

📚 Keep learning, keep growing. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technologies.

🧙 Improve your code sorcery day by day, optimizing application performance.

🗣️ Share the wisdom! Foster a learning environment within our crew.

💾 OUR TECHNICAL STACK

 * You will find mostly Javascript for our micro services (Node.js with Typescript, yes we like clean code!) and PHP for one of our APIs.
 * We recently migrated our stack to AWS to enjoy modern managed solutions. We currently use monitoring services such as Cloudwatch, Lambda functions, RDS databases.
 * We choses to go with an event driven architecture using RabbitMQ hosted on AWS. We use docker when our functions don’t run with Lambdas!
 * Project management is done using Atlassian tools (Jira / Confluence).
 * That’s not all, we are currently separating operational data from data for reporting in order to provide clear and relevant data to the company and we chose to work with some of the best data tools such as DBT, Snowflake and various ETLs.
   
   

DO YOU RECOGNIZE YOURSELF? 😍

Experience

✨ Got 3 to 5 years of full-stack developer experience? Perfect!

🏆 Made some head-turning user-friendly websites or efficient automation tools? We can't wait to see them!

Personality

🎯 Problem-solver: Challenges thrill you and innovative solutions are your forte.

💪 Proactive: You see what needs to be done and you just do it. Waiting around? Not your style.

🌱 Growth Seeker: Challenges are not setbacks, they're opportunities to learn and grow.

🤝 Team-player: You believe in the power of "we". Collaboration is your second nature.

🗣️ Communication Champ: No jargon here, just clear and engaging communication. Got a complex concept? You'll break it down into a bedtime story.

Language:

English: fluent

IT MIGHT NOT BE FOR YOU 🙅‍♀️

 * You don’t like to be challenged and grow in your job
 * You don't like receiving or giving tough feedbacks
 * You don’t usually try to improve the processes in place: if they are here, there is a reason
 * You like to have very specific tasks assigned to you that won’t evolve in the course of a year
 * You like to be told what to do or how to do something on a daily basis
 * None of the following reflects your personal interests: personal development / coaching / professional growth / education / edtech / teaching / edutainment / impact startups
 * Your only driver is joining a full-remote company: yes, our company culture is cool, but we want people to care about our mission, products, and their job!
   
   

🤩 JOIN US IF YOU CRAVE

Growth & Ambition 🚀

🏅 Being surrounded by top team who strive to perform whilst being in a good mood

🏋️‍♀️ No more bosses, but ongoing conversations to support your professional development

⚡️ Being part of an ambitious company with a lot of growth opportunities

Impact & Meaning 🔥

🦄 Playing a crucial role in the development of a company whose content and products are enjoyed by millions of people

🤩 Waking up in the morning knowing you are making a difference: we receive messages every day from clients who have successfully lost weight, quit smoking, reach a mile stone in their business, built better relationships, and made positive changes in their lives.

As Yannick, our community manager, says:

“To make a long story short, Paradox is a growth adventure on steroids, an adventure where you grow personally, whilst helping others do the same.”

But that’s not all, we believe that driven people deserve…

Freedom & Well Being 🗽☀️

😎 A company culture based on autonomy & accountability

🗽 Flexible working hours

🌎 A remote culture from day one with the freedom to work from wherever you want

🏤 Magnificent offices in Dubai, Paris and soon Lisbon: you’re at home worldwide

⌨️ Standing desks paid by the company, if you live far from our offices

💻 Macbook: to be the most efficient in your work

🏀 350€ per year paid by the company to take care of yourself (for your gym, or dance class or whatever make you feel great)

📚 150€ per year paid by the company to boost your knowledge (books, education): we are passionate about learning and want to support your growth)

🤝 1:1 coachings: a Paradox coach supporting you personally or professionally to live your best life

✈️ Annual team building: spoiler alert, our team building this is in Cyprus!

How To Apply 📃

That job description resonated with you?

Click on "Apply for this position" and fill out a short questionnaire (7 to 8 minutes) to tell us more about yourself and send us your CV!

Hiring process

💻 A 15-30 minutes video call with Candice, our Talent Acquisition Manager, to assess the fit between the position, the company, and your own career path.

💻 A video-call focused on your career with Gabriel, our Tech Lead, to review your background & see how we can match your desires with our needs.

💻 A culture-fit video call with Timy, our Head of People, to check in depth the alignment between you and our values and culture.

💼 Reference calls to get in-depth insights about how you work in different environments, make your onboarding easier, and give everybody on the team the insurance to be surrounded by A-Players.

🤗 Welcome aboard!

About Our Hiring Process

Our recruitment process is tailored to do our best to avoid that you or us realize that we’re not a perfect fit in two or six months. It might seem long, but every step serves a purpose and will allow us to get to know you better as much as it’ll help you understand more where you’ll be stepping in.

We also want you to have time to ask all of your questions regarding your job description, the long-term vision of your team and the company, our values, with the relevant interlocutor in front of you.

The steps mentioned above can be rearranged depending on yours and the interviewer’s availability.

How to nail your Paradox application?

✅ Tailor your CV & application to our specific job description and company. Attention to detail is important as an employee as it is as an applicant!

✅ Complete the different steps of the application process in a timely manner, to ensure you don’t miss out on this opportunity!

✅ Help us organize calls with your previous managers (or colleagues and/or clients depending on context and positions) at the end of the recruitment process.

✅ Prepare your interviews and the questions you will ask at each step, depending on who’s conducting it.

title: Software Developer .NET
description:
Als Software Developer .NET bij ilionx ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen van web- en desktoptoepassingen voor klanten. In Microsoft .NET bouw je nieuwe functionaliteiten en onderhoud je de bestaande.

Jouw rol

Je hebt contact met verschillende stakeholders om in kaart te brengen wat de eisen zijn voor de functionaliteit. Op basis daarvan maak je een eerste ontwerp. Met het team van de klant werk je dit ontwerp vervolgens verder uit. Vaak werken jullie hierbij aan verschillende onderdelen, dus jullie houden elkaar regelmatig op de hoogte van de voortgang. Wanneer (een deel van) de functionaliteit klaar is, schrijf je een unit test die je ook zelf uitvoert. Nadat de functionaliteit ook meerdere malen getest is door een Tester, kun je deze deployen naar een plek waar de eindgebruikers de applicatie kunnen gebruiken. Hierna ben je ook verantwoordelijk voor het onderhoud en beheer van je functionaliteiten op de server. Dit beheer doe je in verschillende tools, waaronder Azure DevOps en SQL.

Je werkt bij de klant op locatie; projecten duren meestal tussen de zes maanden en een jaar. Ook ben je ongeveer eens per week op kantoor bij ilionx, zodat je ideeën kunt

uitwisselen en kunt bijpraten met de andere developers.

''Als je nieuwsgierig bent en het leuk vindt om nauw samen te werken met je collega's en je hebt een uitdaging vindt dat je dag vaak anders loopt dan gepland, dan is dit een baan voor jou.''

Wie we zoeken

 * Hbo werk- en denkniveau
 * Minimaal 2 jaar relevante werkervaring
 * Kennis van / ervaring met .NET (Core), MVC, WebApi, JavaScript, SQL, HTML en CSS
 * Je deelt graag kennis met collega's en klanten, en bent op de hoogte van de laatste trends en opkomende technologieën
 * Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse taal
   
   

Wat we bieden

 * 32 tot 40-urige werkweek
 * 26 vakantiedagen
 * Mogelijkheid om (technisch) inhoudelijke trainingen te volgen
 * Maandelijkse bonus
 * Leaseauto
   
   

Wat doe je?

 * 50% functionaliteiten ontwikkelen
 * 20% overleg met collega's
 * 10% projecten plannen
 * 10% bug verhelpen
 * 10% functionaliteiten beheren en onderhouden
   
   

Over ilionx

Onze vestiging in Amsterdam bestaat uit meer dan 150 gedreven, ervaren, slimme en een tikkeltje eigenzinnige professionals die dagelijks gave projecten bij ons op kantoor of op locatie bij de klant uitvoeren. Doordat we werken volgens het local-voor-local principe, zijn we altijd dichtbij, zijn de communicatielijnen kort en kunnen we snel schakelen.

&Work helpt je verder

ilionx werkt samen met &Work. &Work begrijpt dat het belangrijk is om te werken op een plek waar je gewaardeerd wordt, waar je je verder kunt ontwikkelen en waar je de ruimte krijgt om te groeien. Door via &Work te solliciteren, krijg je direct toegang tot hun brede netwerk van werkgevers. &Work kan je helpen bij de introductie bij ilionx, achtergrondinformatie verstrekken, je voorbereiden op gesprekken zodat je jezelf overtuigend kan presenteren en je bijstaan tijdens de onderhandelingen om je een mooie stap vooruit te laten zetten in je carrière.

title: Python Developer
description:
Here at Fashion Cloud we want to build the best software possible to be able to support our growing user base. Our API handles millions of requests per day and serves Terabytes of images and product data. Our code is tested, maintainable and readable. We are a fun international community of engineers that are looking for new inspiring people to join the team and to learn from. We love simple processes that make sense and to work together as a team.

We are on the lookout for someone who likes to take on backend work in Python+Django, and general infrastructure using various AWS services .

We love writing good software and believe in continuous learning. That means you will get time to expand your knowledge or to build a cool side project. You will be able to attend conferences, play around on pluralsight and to get whatever you need to help you to grow. Our company trips, twice a year, are already a legendary tradition. But most above all you will build products that have incredible traction and that our customers love, because we believe in the future of the Wholesale Community.

We have built Fashion Cloud as an international community from day one and now have people from almost 30 nations working in the company. We continue to welcome new employees coming from any country. Within Fashion Cloud, we look at individual people and not at the country they were born in. We keep an open dialogue about what moves all of us and how we can all work together in the best way.

If you have any relevant references that you consider essential for your application, please attach them to your CV.

Your role

Implementation of a complete backend, with challenges like;

 * Input from and output to our customer's software partners
 * Data mapping algorithms
 * Resilient data warehousing for millions of reports
 * Performant APIs to unlock this data
 * Predictive algorithms based on this data to auto-generate order suggestions
 * Maintain and write test cases for all functionalities
 * Professionalize the development further with better tools
 * Keywords; Python, Django, REST APIs, Ansible, Amazon AWS
   
   

Your profile

That's What You Bring To The Table

 * You take pride in delivering work of high quality - While we're at it, we love to see some of your projects!
 * You have a Getting Things Done spirit - Regardless whether you use David Allen's technique or your own
 * You take initiative and responsibility - You own the code, it's up to you to improve it
 * You have experience with automatic software testing - We don't want to waste our time pushing buttons like a monkey
 * You are a definitive team player - You are awarded a silver medal in speaking and a golden medal in listening
 * You speak English fluently
   
   

What we offer

 * Free choice of laptop and equipment (e.g. MacBook)
 * Flexible working times - No 9 to 5, you are in charge of your time!
 * Possibility to work remotely - want to work from another EU country? this is possible for up to 4 weeks a year
 * A great office - we stick to hybrid work model with at least 2 days a week working from the office
 * Summer Camp - a weekend away, full of fun team building activities
 * Summer House - a beautiful location where we work and have fun during summer time
 * Health is wealth - Sports membership discount + mental health support by nilo.health
 * Continuous education - 1000€ yearly development budget, books and online tutorials from Pluralsight
 * Regular team activities - Christmas party, Trivia nights and much more
   
   

We have built Fashion Cloud as an international community from day one and now have people from almost 30 nations working in the company. We continue to welcome new employees coming from any country. Within Fashion Cloud, we look at individual people and not at the country they were born in. We keep an open dialogue about what moves all of us and how we can all work together in the best way.

About Fashion Cloud

We make the fashion industry a better place We digitalize the mutual processes between many different fashion brands and fashion retailers with our software. We built a platform where they exchange content and order products in one place. Our services come down in several solutions, such as web applications, mobile apps, and we ain’t done yet! "Our vision? A strong wholesale community in which all players work together seamlessly! Together with our brands and retailers, we are approaching this goal step by step. Every day we work hard on our mission, which is to build the leading platform where fashion brands and retailers collaborate and trade. Our company values ensure that the corporate culture at Fashion Cloud is characterized by care, passion and optimism and encourages people to bring their toll of street smart into the company. We always aim high – which sometimes makes our goals appear unreachable. But with the right amount of motivation and ambition, we manage to even make the impossible possible!"

&Work will help you

Fashion Cloud has partnered with &Work. &Work understands that it is important to work in a place where you are valued, where you can develop further and where you are given the space to grow. By applying via &Work, you get direct access to their broad network of employers. &Work can help you with the introduction atFashion Cloud, provide background information, prepare you for interviews so that you can present yourself convincingly and assist you during the negotiations to help you take a nice step forward in your career.

title: Backend Developer
description:
Undagrid is an IoT software solution provider for the traceability of business goods and materials. As a Backend developer at Undagrid, you will be responsible for the development, testing, maintenance, and documentation of our back-end and various public APIs that are critical for our IoT solutions. Your role will involve creating innovative features and ensuring our APIs are user-friendly and meet the diverse needs of our customers. You'll collaborate closely with the Solution Architect and Mobile Software Developer to enhance Undagrid's solutions and deliver an exceptional user experience.




The key responsibilities:




 * Backend- and API Development: You will be at the forefront of API development, creating robust and scalable solutions. Your expertise will be essential in designing, coding, and testing APIs that meet the specific requirements of our customers. By understanding their unique use cases, you will develop APIs that enable seamless integration of our IoT solutions into their existing systems.
 * Customer Focus: With a customer-centric approach, you will gain a deep understanding of our users' needs and expectations. By actively engaging with customers and conducting user research, you will identify pain points, gather feedback, and translate these insights into actionable improvements for our APIs. Your goal will be to exceed customer expectations and ensure the Undagrid APIs deliver outstanding value.
 * API Support: You will provide exceptional support to our end-users, guiding them through the implementation and usage of our APIs. Your technical expertise and problem-solving skills will be crucial in troubleshooting issues, resolving challenges, and ensuring smooth integration for our customers. By offering timely and effective support, you will build strong relationships with our users and contribute to their success.
 * Integration with 3rd Party APIs: Collaboration will be key as you work closely with external partners to integrate their APIs into our platform. Your ability to understand and adapt to different API frameworks will enable seamless interoperability between Undagrid and other systems. By fostering strong relationships with 3rd party API providers, you will contribute to expanding our ecosystem and delivering comprehensive solutions.
 * Documentation and Communication: You will be responsible for creating clear and comprehensive documentation for our APIs. By providing detailed technical guides, examples, and tutorials, you will empower developers to successfully integrate our APIs. Additionally, you will collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to communicate the value of our APIs to external stakeholders, highlighting their benefits and use cases.
 * Continuous Improvement: As a Backend Developer, you will continuously strive for excellence. By staying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices, you will identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in our API offerings. Your insights and contributions will help shape the future direction of Undagrid's solutions, ensuring we remain at the forefront of IoT technology.




We expect from you:




 * Relevant Bachelor's or master's degree in Software development
 * Javascript & Typescript
 * Express
 * NodeJS
 * MongoDB
 * MQTT
 * Cooperation at a multidisciplinary level
 * A pre is having knowledge about e.g.: PostgreSQL, Apache Spark, Python, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Java/Scala, gRPC




At our company, we strive to provide a diverse and rewarding work environment where everyone feels valued and empowered. When you join our team, you can expect the following:




 * Competitive Compensation and Growth Opportunities: We offer a competitive salary that reflects your skills and experience. Additionally, we believe in fostering professional growth, providing opportunities for career advancement and skill development within our organization.
 * Exciting Work with a Global Impact: Get ready for an exhilarating daily work experience where you'll directly engage with our diverse and global customer base. You'll have the chance to collaborate with people from around the world, gaining insights and perspectives that will broaden your horizons.
 * Supportive and Knowledge-Sharing Team: Our team is not only highly motivated but also committed to supporting and welcoming new members. We value knowledge sharing and collaboration, ensuring that you have the resources and support needed to excel in your role. Together, we create an inclusive and empowering work culture.
 * Performance-Based Stock Option Plan: As a testament to our belief in recognizing individual contributions, we offer a stock option plan based on both performance and experience. This allows you to share in our success and be part of our collective growth.
 * Transportation Benefits: We provide a public transport card, ensuring your commute to work is convenient and hassle-free. This benefit supports sustainability and promotes a greener way of commuting.
 * Inspiring Office Space: Our brand new office, located in the heart of Utrecht, awaits you. Situated right at the central train station, it offers easy accessibility and a vibrant atmosphere. The inspiring office environment is designed to enhance your creativity and productivity.
 * Regular Social Team Events: We understand the importance of work-life balance and fostering strong team bonds. That's why we organize bi-monthly social team events, where you can connect with your colleagues outside of work, build relationships, and have fun together.
 * Flexible Work Arrangements: We believe in offering flexibility to our employees, which includes the possibility of partly working from home. This allows you to achieve a better work-life balance and tailor your work environment to suit your needs.




Don't miss out on this exceptional opportunity to join our team and contribute to a revolutionary product that is transforming the IoT industry. Apply today and be part of an open workplace where your skills, ideas, and contributions are valued and celebrated.

title: Backend Development Internship
description:
Are you a Computer Science student in your final year of studies looking to kickstart your career with an internship? Would you like to work on a global high-performance fan-engagement platform that delivers the best possible experience to our customers?




If yes, then we have the perfect opportunity for you!




At MatchWornShirt it’s our mission to be the world's leading fan engagement solution. We do this by partnering with the world's biggest sports teams and players. We continuously surprise our clients and customers with innovations and new services driven by our technological expertise.




What you will be part of:




 * You will join us right at the start of the development of our globally distributed network of fan engagement products
 * You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers that work together closely on our new micro-service oriented platform (back-end as well as front-end)
 * We are currently developing a completely new backend-end platform that needs to enable our business to grow rapidly
 * You will work on a platform that needs to be highly customizable, flexible and scale well all over the globe. This requires you to apply the latest innovations in the field of backend-end technologies




For our technical stack and infrastructure, we use technologies that scale globally, are open source and enable our team to deliver quality products. Our main technologies are .NET 6, ElasticSearch, NoSQL and VueJS (Nuxt). Our infrastructure relies on edge computing, CDN, serverless and Kubernetes for scalability on AWS. Where necessary we leverage machine learning to help solve business problems.




Your daily activities will include writing structured solid code, implementing software patterns, code reviewing, innovating new products and helping our team make the best products.




Requirements




 * You are currently studying towards / just finished a HBO/Bachelor/Masters degree in Computer science, Design, Development or similar
 * You have an EU passport or you are enrolled with a school in the Netherlands
 * You are available for 5/6 months internship starting from February
 * You are fluent in English
 * You are flexible and well-organised, ready to join a fast-growing organisation
 * You want to do good and contribute to a better world
 * No, not everyone needs to be a football fan 😉




Benefits




 * Freedom and Responsibility
 * Opportunity to create and execute your own projects
 * Being a part of our young and international team that is growing rapidly
 * A gym at the office
 * Daily healthy lunch
 * ‘Swapfiets’ bike in Amsterdam
 * Weekly Friday afternoon drinks
 * Competitive remuneration of EUR 500 p/m
 * Working with A-level (sport) clients all over the world
 * You could grow into a full time job after your internship has ended!




Our procedure consists of three rounds:




 * Getting to know each other (HR intro call),
 * Assessment round: an assessment (homework, 2 hours max.)
 * Final conversation with the hiring manager




If all goes well, we will provide you with an offer letter and we can welcome you to the team!




Grab this opportunity and conquer the international sports world with us!




Don’t hesitate to reach out to Fabienne Davids directly.




Email: fabienne@matchwornshirt.com

title: Web Developer
description:
Our mission is great open source




It is our mission to make open source software available to people everywhere. We create world-renowned software, impacting the lives of millions of people every day.




The web team works in a multi-disciplinary environment with visual designers, UX designers and other developers to bring exciting new web projects to life. We help and learn from each other and constantly strive to improve both our work and our processes.




Required Skills And Experience




 * Demonstrable experience of work on modern web applications
 * A strong understanding of HTML, CSS with SCSS and JavaScript
 * Experience with Javascript components libraries
 * Experience with TypeScript
 * Experience with responsive user interfaces for a wide range of devices and browsers
 * Experience with Git or other version control systems
 * Awareness of SEO best practice
 * Consideration of accessibility in all aspects of your work
 * A strong understanding of web performance in complex user interfaces
 * Ability to interact with UX, designers and server-side developers
 * Curiosity about technology and a thirst to learn
 * Based in EMEA timezones (Europe, the Middle East and Africa)
 * University degree or equivalent education




Useful experience if you have it




 * Familiarity with Linux desktop technologies
 * Server-side languages, such as Python or NodeJS
 * Experience working on a large scale React (with TypeScript) project
 * A history of open source contributions
 * Relevant work experience




Who you are




We want a Web Developer who loves what they do. You are passionate about web standards and keep abreast of new developments in our industry. You always look for opportunities to improve your skills. You like to show off what you're working on and also learn from others. You have strong attention to detail and value the design of a product as much as you value the code. You have strong communication skills and maybe even blog once in a while. You're aware of the latest CSS techniques but also know the limitations that developing for a broad audience can bring - actually, you embrace the challenge.




In this team




 * You'll create high fidelity websites and web apps using the latest incarnations of HTML, CSS (SCSS) and Javascript (React and TypeScript)
 * You'll help maintain existing projects including updating content and adding new pages
 * You'll manage incoming requests for updates and liaise with or delegate to other people as necessary
 * You'll ensure the standard of our output remains high and consistent across our whole product portfolio
 * You'll ensure new pages are published according to specification and in compliance with our web style guide
 * You'll participate in and contribute to our living style guide, Vanilla Framework.
 * Work closely with UX designers and visual designers to implement exemplary user experiences.




What we offer




 * An opportunity to help shape a company and products with a strong influence in the open source community
 * An inclusive work environment within a team of friendly people with a broad range of skill sets, from UX designers to copywriters
 * Learning and development
 * Annual compensation review
 * Recognition rewards
 * Annual leave
 * Priority Pass for travel




We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Data engineer - Entry level, Amsterdam
description:
As a Data Engineer you will be maintaining and enhancing the internal data warehouse and creating data flows into it, thus, you help the work of the data scientists. You will create and maintain ETL components, create tests to automate data integrity checks, resolve problems with data availability and integrity, and manage and monitor data gathering procedures.

Functie-eisen

 * Bachelor’s degree (preferably in computer science, computer engineering, information technology or similar)
 * Proficiency with Python, SQL and preferably with Linux
 * Excellent command in English, both written & oral
 * Experience with Cloud platforms
 * Git, Docker or similar is a plus
   

Functie-voorstel

Arbeidsvoorwaarden

 * Excellent salary
 * Options plan
 * Remote/hybrid possibility
 * Flexible working hours
 * Pension scheme
 * Dynamic team with great vibes

Sollicitatieprocedure

Do you want to be part of a project that helps improve people's lives? Contact our recruitment specialist Judit Kiss on +31 20 614 27 11 for more information.

title: Front End Developer
description:
Ben jij iemand die leergierig is op het gebied van techniek en marketing, graag meedenkt over de beste gebruikers ervaring en kan je dit ook realiseren tot een werkend eind product? Hou je van verantwoordelijkheid, werken in een klein team en een platte bedrijfscultuur?

Functieomschrijving

Vanuit de IMU faciliteren we ondernemers en bedrijven om een impact te maken in de wereld met hun diensten en producten. Wij doen dit door mensen te helpen met hun online marketingstrategie via onze softwaretools; Phoenix, Huddle en Plug&Pay.

Elke dag komen er meer dan 200.000 mensen langs pagina's en community's die onze klanten hebben gemaakt. Voor onze klanten is het belangrijk dat zij op een snelle en eenvoudige manier met onze systemen kunnen werken. Daarbij is het ook belangrijk dat de gebruikers van onze klanten weer gemakkelijk met onze systemen overweg kunnen, want als iemand een website heeft gemaakt met Phoenix, moeten de bezoekers van deze websites natuurlijk wel op prachtig goed werkende website uitkomen.

Je denkt voornamelijk vanuit het oogpunt van de gebruikers; Moet er een nieuwe feature worden geïmplementeerd? Dan bedenk je eerst hoe de gebruiker met deze feature om gaat en waarom hij of zij deze feature nodig heeft. Heb je hoogte gekregen van een nieuwe techniek of methodiek? Dan bespreek je graag met het team of dit iets is wat ten goede komt van de ontwikkeling van de software.

Ben jij iemand die leergierig is op het gebied van techniek en marketing, graag meedenkt over de beste gebruikers ervaring en kan je dit ook realiseren tot een werkend eind product?

Hoe zit een dag bij IMU eruit?

Je komt op kantoor aan en Maartje van de support heeft net een taak aan je toegewezen met betrekking tot de net nieuw geïmplementeerde Media Library.

Maar heeft de issue op dat moment wel veel impact of beperkt het de gebruiker niet direct, misschien is er wel een tijdelijke work-around? Je kan direct inschatten of hiervoor een hotfix gedeployed moet worden of dat je eerst je huidige taak af maakt.

Tijdens het ontwikkelen denk je altijd van uit de gebruiker - "Als Hendrik-Jan dit zou moeten instellen, zou hij dit dan kunnen vinden?". Daarbij ben je altijd gedreven om nieuwe dingen te leren en kan je het direct vertalen naar iets technisch.

Martijn stuurt je namelijk weer een mailtje over een nieuwe psychologische trigger wat er voor zorgt dat de bezoeker eerder zijn of haar e-mail adres achterlaat. "Hoe zou dit code-technish werken? Oh! dat is eigenlijk best makkelijk om te bouwen!".

Wij vragen

Je kent de klappen van de javascriptzweep en hebt ervaring met Vue.js (!), Angular of React.

Je hebt ervaring met het ontwikkelen van websites en CMS systemen.

Jouw kennis van HTML en (S)CSS is vanzelfsprekend perfect. Droom je het al?

Opleiding genoten m.b.t. Marketing/ Communicatie/Multimedia/Informatiekunde

Je kijkt altijd wat jij aan een situatie kan doen in plaats van de schuld bij iemand anders te zoeken.

Niets zo fijn als op de fiets naar kantoor te kunnen, maar als je het niet erg vind om te dealen met de NS is dat ook oké

Gebruikersgemak? Jij weet precies hoe je tools inricht voor de beste UX

Wij bieden

Vergoeding Je krijgt een marktconform salaris op basis van jouw kennis en ervaring

Groeipotentie Je salaris groeit mee met je verantwoordelijkheid. Er is geen salarisplafond (nee, ook niet van glas)

Voeding Er staat een gevulde koelkast voor je klaar met de mogelijkheid om (gezond) te koken

Sport Elke maandag om 16;00 uur sporten we met het hele team. Zweten tot je erbij neervalt!

Autonomie Je bent zelfstandig en bent vrij om jouw 'stukje van de business' naar een volgend niveau te tillen

Legendarische trips Minstens 1x per jaar gaan we met z'n allen op reis.

Zomer en winterfeesten met +1 Want als je een partner hebt willen we die ook graag leren kennen.

Vrijheid Geen vast aantal vakantiedagen en geen vaste uren. Op basis van je verantwoordelijkheid maak je zelf je planning (i.o.m. je team).

Ontwikkeling Groei staat centraal bij de IMU. Wil je je ergens in ontwikkelen? Dan helpen en ondersteunen we je daarbij.

Vriendschap Alleen maar leuke mensen bij de IMU. Je vriendengroep is er niets bij!

Over Internet Marketing Unie

Vanuit de IMU leren wij ondernemers hoe zij meer online resultaat kunnen behalen. We bloggen, maken video's, geven trainingen en verkopen onze eigen website software. De IMU is online groot en een bekende naam in de markt maar offline zijn wij met een compact, creatief en jong team (10 FTE tussen de 20 - 30 jaar). Op ons kantoor hangt een gezellige sfeer en wordt er op een ontspannen manier keihard gewerkt. We geloven in autonomie, verantwoordelijkheid, life long learning en energie boven de ouderwetse 9 tot 5 mentaliteit en afgebakende functieprofielen. We vinden elkaar niet alleen op professioneel gebied, maar ook tijdens de toffe dingen die we samen doen. Denk hierbij aan samen op reis, bootje varen, bedrijfsborrels, brainstormsessies, event- en seminarbezoeken enzovoorts.

Hoe nu verder?

Ben jij geinteresseerd in bovenstaand profiel voor Front End Developer? Internet Marketing Unie ziet graag jouw sollicitatie tegemoet! Door middel van het klikken op de solliciteerbutton kom je in een overzichtelijk sollicitatiescherm waar je met jouw CV kan reageren op de vacature van Front End Developer.

title: ASP.NET C# Developer
description:
C# Software Engineer | C# Developer | Expats are welcome | Work in Amsterdam | Multicultural team | Lots of technical diversity | Work permits can be granted | ASP.NET MVC, C#, Entity Framework, Html, JQuery, Microsoft Cloud




Do you have mad coding skills? Is innovation part of your DNA? Do you love the speed at which digital technology is evolving? Are you always looking for the best solution?




Are you ready to broaden your horizons with cloud computing? Then you might be a perfect match for this software development team. They are convinced that teamwork will make the difference. Teamwork is the way to achieve breakthrough innovations.




As an ASP.NET C# software engineer, you design, code and test business software applications and propose architectural decisions within a team of highly skilled developers. You are part of the decision making. You inspiring your colleagues, share your knowledge and have a keen eye for innovation. Our client, the employer, values that their Software Engineers take ownership for the quality of their work. They are really proud of their work. Troubleshooting and solve software bugs is of course part of the job as well.




According the C# Software Engineers in place, it’s great to work as a software engineer at their company. The very great thing of this company is that there's a lot of room for personal initiative. You are the one to drive innovation! This means you explore new technologies, bring your own ideas to the table, and don't stop improving, so that they provide their fixed international customers with the latest Microsoft technologies and application to run their businesses in a digital world.




They use Microsoft platforms like SQL Server and .Net Framework and have multiple critical business applications based on these platforms. Their Applications development and Databases team is responsible for interfacing between applications, reporting, Business Intelligence, implementing new business applications and management of the application software assets.




The employer is looking for ASP.NET C# developers who can join the Microsoft development teams and who can translate business requirements into technical requirements and is able to develop applications in a well-organized manner.




Requested experience and knowledge;




 * The ability to look at their business software and applications from a user perspective.
 * At least a bachelor’s degree in Technology and a passion development / Information technology.
 * Experience in software engineering.
 * Experience with ASP.NET MVC, C#, Entity Framework, Html and JQuery.
 * Experience with web development, design patterns, cloud patterns and cloud deployment platforms.
 * design, code and test via test driven development.
 * have knowledge of continuous delivery.
 * Fluent in English, both verbally and written.




This employer combines the energy of a start-up with the benefits of a multinational. They truly think actions speak louder than words and continuously strive for innovation; technical as well as personal. Each day again, they challenge themselves to be better than the day before. There’s never a dull moment at this IT software company.




They have and experienced, open, and welcoming culture in which anybody can have impact. They value ideas by their merit, not by their source. New opinions, people and principles keep their minds flexible, while they stay committed to their mission of empowering enterprises to be the driving force of the global economy.




The offer;




Just like most clients of SDP, our client will offer ASP.NET C# professionals a tailor-made package of secondary benefits. Salary is being determined on the ASP.NET C# development level and they always strive to overbid current salary indications. Due to the continuous growth of this Microsoft company, there are many opportunities to develop further and grow. Our client also provides work permits for non- Europeans as they are a welcoming company for all cultures in the world.




Are you interested in this permanent vacancy at our client? Please forward your CV to mario@servicedrivenprofessionals.nl or call +31 (0)6 10 29 91 58. Also, for additional questions you are welcome to get in contact.




Met vriendelijke groet/ Kind regards,




Mario John Lemmers BSc.
